derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin herbaceus 'grassy' (from herba 'grass, herb') + -ous

entry.def: Herbaceous plants have green stems, not hard, woody stems.

means.word_mean: 1. characteristic of a nonwoody herb or plant part
